name: 荒野大蛮神
description: There is no english version for this game.We only supply simple chinese version at this time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 64 bit Processor: 2.50GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: HD4400 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: 3.50GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT520 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
